segmentUpfrontCheckResult.checkDescription: CARGO CANNOT BE ACCEPTED WITHOUT ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS AND MUST BE ORIGINAL AWB 2(FOR CONSIGNEE)
E-awb is not valid in Customs of Brazil and Argentina. Please make sure to send original airwaybills.

In accordance with the rule that the GRU Custom authority has notified, Wooden pallets and wooden packages that is attached to GRU shipments must have IPPC labels on them. Wooden pallets and wooden packages that do not have the relevant label could not be accepted. All shipments should be accepted and prepared according to the above mentioned rule to avoid any unwanted delays and penalties.
E-awb cannot been used in GRU Station, hardcopy must be sent.
Goverment customs authority implementing to penalty in the airlines due to it is  writing over AS GREED in the AWB.
CONSIGNEE PHONE AND FAX MUST BE INSERTED ON THE AWB.

The Pre-approval must be requested from grucargo@thy.com  for all trucking services in Brazil.
Cargo with total amount over 1.000.000 BRL escorts will be required and the cost will be transferred to the customer.
The shipment invoice is higher than 1.000.000 BRL so it is need to be escort service for safe the truck.
PARTIAL SHIPMENT CANNOT BE ACCEPTED
FLIGHTS MUST NOT BE OVERBOOKED. BIG AMOUNTS OF CARGO MUST NOT BE ACCEPTED FROM THE ORIGIN POINTS WHICH HAVE LOW RATES.
